title: Reserves, deposits, loans after bond purchase

content.question: Suppose that the central bank buys $100 worth of bonds on the open market in a country whose banking system has limited reserves. Assume that the required reserve ratio is 10 percent, banks keep no excess reserves, and there are no cash leakages. After banks have made all adjustments, reserves, demand deposits, and loans will increase by which of the following?

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Determine the effect(s) of a change in an economic situation using quantitative data or calculations.
